File.Title: Will Gavi support implementation of RTS,S as for other vaccines?
File.HtmlText: RTS,S is expected to be available through usual procurement process including UN agencies (UNICEF) with support from Gavi. Gavi has included malaria vaccine in their Vaccine Investment Strategy (a) and is now looking into its role (and that of Global Fund against AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria) into financing of Pilot introduction projects as recommended by WHO.
